channel.description: Recent content in VLAN on Andrew's Admin Archives

item.title: Isolate your homelab using VLANs, Proxmox, and OPNsense
item.description: Create a secure and efficient isolated homelab on a non-VLAN aware home network using VLAN-aware switches and Proxmox bridges. When paired with Wireguard, you can securely access this network from anywhere. No longer takes down your entire houses network when you mess something up!
